channel.title: Help with some (hopefully) minor problem
channel.description:
Ok this is what is happening. Whenever I go to Yahoo, Hotmail or RuneScape and enter my User and Pass and then press Login the "This Page cannot be displayed" message comes up. It also happens with MSN Messenger, it says Cannot login, troublshoot problem and when I do it says things about DNS Server and ports. This happens to me occasionally and I always fix it by System Restoring. This time I tried it 2 or 3 times and it still is screwing me up.
Can someone come up with an explanation for this =/
~ VG_Kobra ~

item.title: Help with some (hopefully) minor problem
